titles.title: A resolution supporting May 2005 as "National Better Hearing and Speech Month" and commending those states that have implemented routine hearing screening for every newborn before the newborn leaves the hospital.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.
Senate Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: 4/29/2005--Passed Senate without amendment. Expresses support for the goals and ideals of May 2005 as National Better Hearing and Speech Month. Commends those States that have implemented routine hearing screenings for every newborn before they leave the hospital. Encourages all people in the United States to have their hearing checked regularly.
